duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and manage the tax function for existing and new renewable projects across the U.S. and corporate entities.
Engage in tax modeling and various forms of federal, state, and local tax, accounting, management, and investor reporting.
Liaise with deal team members, asset managers, treasury, affiliates’ tax teams, external consultants, and tax authorities for various tax-related matters.
Coordinate on key tax items across the company and focus on initiatives related to establishing, standardizing, optimizing, and documenting tax processes, workflows, and controls.
Lead and collaborate with teams located in different time zones and jurisdictions.

education_certification.credential: MBA, Certified Public Accountant (CPA), Tax LLM, or similar certification are all pluses but are not required.
